Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a solo home run in the ninth inning to tie the game
The Mets scored 6 runs in the ninth inning to take the lead
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor was referred to as a'special player' and 'MVP' by manager Carlos Mendoza
Lindor mentioned the significance of the 23rd anniversary of the attacks at the World Trade Center
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets wore caps in honor of the 9/11 first responders
Sean Manaea delivered a strong pitching performance with 8 strikeouts
Others: The Mets moved a game ahead of the Braves in the race for the NL's third wild card
The Braves played a night game in Washington
